name: Supervised model quality
description:
Generates an evaluation from an existing model by retrieving the dataset used for training and doing an 80%-20% split of the data. The output of the script is a map with the information needed to build a report about the estimated quality for the model.
The output contains information about the original fields and rows used for training, the model configuration and the evaluated performance.

outputs.name: quality-info
outputs.description: Information about the model and estimated evaluation
